title: HEALTH – Adds to existing law to provide for disclosure and labeling of certain blood intended for blood transfusions and to provide that a person receiving a blood transfusion shall have the right to request blood based on vaccination status of the donor.
subject: HEALTH
MEDICAL
VACCINATION
